DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : The study aim assess efficacy new mouthwash treat oral lesion due removable prosthesis . Methods : The present prospective randomize clinical trial perform 44 patient . The experimentation last 4 week 4 operator participate . The effect mouthwash evaluate subjectively objectively , questionnaire , Visual Analogic Scales clinical examination . The result statistically analyze . The following variable record : presence mucosal lesion due incongruous removable prosthesis last pain rinsing .
DOC.detailed_description: The aim present prospective , randomize , triple-blind control clinical trial evaluate efficacy innovative mouthwash ( emulsion ) treatment lesion oral mucosa due removable prosthesis . The tested preparation contain two active molecule : topical antiseptic ( 0.1 % hexetidine ) local anesthetic ( 0.5 % chlorobutanol ) .
DOC.criteria: Use removable partial complete denture ; Presence lesion oral mucosa due denture ; Absence concomitant local systemic pathology ; Absence pregnancy breastfeeding ; Negative allergic anamnesis ; Negative anamnesis recurrent aphthous stomatitis ; No take medicine potential pharmacologic interaction molecule test ; No take antibiotic and/or painkiller least 6 month enter experimentation ; Good oral hygiene fullmouth plaque score ≤25 % ; Non smoke light smoking ( ≤10 cigarettes/day ) status . Missing one described condition automatically exclude subject study .
